title: Surviving The Hardcore Minecraft Zombie Apocalypse
author: Forge Labs
description:
Whoever Can Survive The Most Days in a Zombie Apocalypse in Hardcore Minecraft Wins 🤖 Install Mech Arena for FREE here ✅ https://clik.cc/Js25t  and get a special starter pack to help kickstart your game! ⭐️

Similar to my previous video " I Spent 100 Days on a Deserted Island in Minecraft and Here's What Happened " but this time, I'm competing against my man Unsorted Guy, Legundo and Robert. Who can survive the most days on in a Zombie Apocalypse

Unsorted Guy's video:
https://youtu.be/cAPQysIo6vE

Robert's Video:
https://youtu.be/ArrPQNGhB7Q

Legundo's Video:
https://youtu.be/-AqehiLKY4I

Patreon (Get the map here!)!:
https://www.patreon.com/ForgeLabs

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/zombie-apocalypse-slow-zombies-by-forge-labs

BIG MASSIVE THANKS TO: Kittyrules, & Catsomniac for building the map!
